reviewText: Love this.  Stefanie is wonderful and helps to show each exercise.  Wonderful role model to help you to learn how to begin a Pilates program.
Awesome workout for both young and seniors.  Incorporates plates moves in a less intensive format.
Good for seniors!  I love Stefanie Powers she does a great job!
Love, love, love this! So gentle, yet a wonderful stretching workout. I know it's an older program, but I sure wish it came in DVD format!
